segments.source_content: In the age of code generation, you need a backend that you can confidently generate with AI platforms. Convex is by far and away [best in class](https://stack.convex.dev/introducing-fullstack-bench) in this respect.

translations.zh-hant: 在程式碼自動生成時代，您需要能讓 AI 平台安心生成程式碼的後端服務。Convex 在此領域[絕對領先同類產品](https://stack.convex.dev/introducing-fullstack-bench)。

segments.source_content: This is because Convex is just TypeScript, allowing you to write [queries as code](https://docs.convex.dev/functions/query-functions/) that are automatically transactional, cached, and realtime.

translations.zh-hant: 因為 Convex 採用 TypeScript，讓您能用程式碼編寫[查詢函式](https://docs.convex.dev/functions/query-functions/)，這些函式自動具備事務處理、快取和即時更新能力。

segments.source_content: And that’s just the beginning. With Convex, you can:

segments.source_content: Vercel released a new minor version of Next.js, with major DX improvements. Highlights include:

translations.zh-hant: Vercel 發布 Next.js 新版次，大幅改善開發體驗，重點更新包括：

segments.source_content:
- Redesigned error UI and improved stack traces: A redesigned debugging experience leveraging the brand-new React [`captureOwnerStack()`](https://react.dev/reference/react/captureOwnerStack) API
- Streaming metadata: Async metadata will no longer block page rendering or client-side page transitions
- Turbopack performance improvements: Faster compile times and reduced memory usage
- React View Transitions (experimental): Experimental support for React's new View Transitions API
- Node.js Middleware (experimental): Experimental support for using the Node.js runtime in Middleware

translations.zh-hant:
- 重新設計錯誤 UI 與強化堆疊追蹤：採用 React 全新 [`captureOwnerStack()`](https://react.dev/reference/react/captureOwnerStack) API 的除錯體驗
- 串流中繼資料：非同步中繼資料不再阻擋頁面渲染或客戶端頁面轉換
- Turbopack 效能提升：編譯加速與記憶體用量降低
- React 視圖轉換（實驗性）：支援 React 新視圖轉換 API
- Node.js 中介軟體（實驗性）：支援在中介軟體中使用 Node.js 運行環境

segments.source_content: A new TanStack library, years in the making, has just been released as stable. The announcement post highlights an interesting subset of its features:

translations.zh-hant: 歷經多年開發，TanStack 全新函式庫正式發布穩定版。公告文章重點介紹其特色功能：

segments.source_content:
- Framework agnostic, headless: Supports 5 frameworks, including React used in the post's examples
- Extreme type safety: I must admit `<form.Field>` is a pretty cool API
- Schema validation: Support for Zod, Valibot, ArkType, Standard Schema
- Async validation, built-in debouncing, AbortSignal
- Isomorphic, multi-platform: share validation logic across client/server

translations.zh-hant:
- 框架無關與無頭設計：支援 5 種框架，文章範例採用 React
- 極致型別安全：創新 `<form.Field>` API 設計
- 結構描述驗證：支援 Zod、Valibot、ArkType 及標準結構描述
- 非同步驗證、內建防抖動、AbortSignal 中斷機制
- 同構多平台：可共享客戶端/伺服端驗證邏輯

segments.source_content: Join Lazar from Sentry for a hands-on session where you’ll build it, break it, debug it, and fix it. You’ll set up Sentry, track errors, use Session Replay and Tracing, and leverage some good ol’ AI to find and fix issues fast.

segments.source_content: ByteDance just announced Lynx, their native cross-platform technology. It’s used extensively in their production apps, including TikTok\! With React bindings, it’s a serious competitor to React Native, and support for other frameworks is expected. The architectural choices are interesting, with a dual-thread model and different runtimes. It has support for some CSS and Web APIs that even React Native still doesn’t have and uses convenient built-in JSX intrinsic elements like `<view>`.

translations.zh-hant: 位元組跳動剛剛宣布了 Lynx，他們的原生跨平台技術。這項技術被廣泛應用於他們的生產應用程式中，包括 TikTok！透過 React 綁定，它成為了 React Native 的強勁競爭者，並且預期將支援其他框架。其架構選擇相當有趣，採用了雙執行緒模型和不同的執行環境。它支援一些連 React Native 尚未具備的 CSS 和 Web API，並使用了方便的內建 JSX 內建元素，例如 `<view>`。

segments.source_content: The feature set at launch is impressive, but there are also some surprising things you might dislike, such as using React 17 / Preact, or custom elements on the web. Time will tell whether the technology lives up to its promise and can truly compete with the established player. In any case, competition is healthy.

translations.zh-hant: 發布時的功能組合令人印象深刻，但也有一些你可能不喜歡的驚人之處，例如使用 React 17 / Preact，或在網頁上使用自訂元素。時間將證明這項技術是否能兌現承諾，並真正與現有的主要競爭者匹敵。無論如何，競爭是健康的。
